item.description:
@L30tegna wrote:

i have a error if i compil this
public synchronized static final native void IPBan(String str);
static{
Thread.setDefaultUncaughtExceptionHandler(new Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler(){
public void uncaughtException(Thread theThread; Throwable theThrown){
}
});
} it give me this error

client.java:37: ‘)’ expected
public void uncaughtException(Thread theThread; Throwable theThrown){
^
client.java:37: ‘;’ expected
public void uncaughtException(Thread theThread; Throwable theThrown){
^
2 errors
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 23, 2008, 05:18:34 PM[/size][hr]pleas help me…
